poliastro.worldview.earth.plotting.utils¶

Holds utilities related with Earth plotting.

Module Attributes

EARTH_PALETTE

A color palette based on Earth colors.
poliastro.worldview.earth.plotting.utils.EARTH_PALETTE = {'dessert_color': 'd8c596', 'lake_color': '#e9eff9', 'land_color': '#9fc164', 'ocean_color': '#b2d9ff'}¶

A color palette based on Earth colors.
